Camp Name: 2025 Summer Camp - Half Day Tennis & Swim
Description: Two hours of tennis instruction followed by one hour of free swim. Complimentary Wilson racket included. Lifeguard on duty during swim (movie option for non-swimmers). Member rate shown; non-members pay additional 15%. No refunds.
